title: Justine Jones from Employed To Serve/Holy Roar Records
itunes:title: Justine Jones from Employed To Serve/Holy Roar Records
description:
Justine Jones is the vocalist from Employed To Serve and works at an incredible label called Holy Roar Records and of course is our guest this week. We get in depth with nu-metal, being married to a band mate and life in England. Quite a pleasant chat and one that I hope you enjoy.

Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
